@Version(value="0.0.2")

Package com.adobe.granite.activitystreams

Provides a framework for reading and writing activity streams

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Activity
    Activity Note that property names and descriptions were reused from http://activitystrea.ms/specs/json/1.0/.
    ActivityCollection
    A simple collection of activities usually aggregated from several activity streams.
    ActivityEventConstants
    Defines constants for activity events.
    ActivityManager
    The activity manager is used as entry point to read, create and write activities and activity streams.
    ActivityObject
    ActivityObject specifies a general object use with activities.
    ActivityStream
    Provides an abstraction of an activity stream.
    ActivityStreamFilter
    ActivityStreamFilter allows filtering activity streams.
    AggregateOptions
    AggregateOptions provides options for activity aggregation.
    JsonAdaptable
    Generic interface that allows adaption to a json object
    JsonConstants
    JSONConstants...
    MediaLink
    MediaLink...
    MutableActivity
    MutableActivity...
    MutableActivityObject
    MutableActivityObject...
    MutableMediaLink
    MutableMediaLink...
    ObjectTypes
    Defines the well known object types as specified in http://activitystrea.ms/specs/json/schema/activity-schema.html#object-types
    Verbs
    Defines the well known verbs as specified in http://activitystrea.ms/specs/json/schema/activity-schema.html#verbs
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ActivityException
    ActivityException...
